content: KH-EZ I Screw anchor with internally threaded head Ultimate screw anchor for quicker and more economical fastening of threaded rod to concrete (carbon steel, internally threaded) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time and labor-saving fastening solution especially suited for seismic and cracked concrete overhead applications requiring an ICC approval Quicker and more convenient to install overhead than flush anchors – smaller drilling diameter and no hammering required Easier to set, even under critical conditions – optimized screw threads and cutting edges suitable for high-strength concrete, used drill bits, rebar hits, and other challenging base materials For use with standard ANSI-tolerance drill bits – no special tolerance drill bits required when installing these screw anchors KH-EZ I 3/8 is FM approved for hanging of pipes up to 8” diameter Applications Various piping or ventilation duct installation applications Rod hangers for single or multiple pipes Suitable for repetitive installation tasks For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Internally threaded Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Internally threaded | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked) | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening | Reusable (and removable) | Not Possible | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | IBC compliance | IBC 2018 | Installation direction | All | Material composition | Steel, zinc-plated (min. 8 µm) ### ITEMS- 423471 -
